post.text: My economic plan includes an across-the-board income tax reduction that helps EVERYONE, especially the middle class. My plan is ALL about economic recovery and prosperity, and will create A LOT of high-paying jobs so EVERYONE has the opportunity to once again, live the American Dream! #AmericaFirst

comment.author: Madeline
comment.text: Deport 30 million illegals and muslims, get them off the government welfare roles, bring back manufacturing, auto, steel, mining, farming and ranching..... move another 30 million form unemployment to working, and build a tax base..... that is a good start....
